As <@UH8A351DJ> said you have to be careful with multidimensional array syntax. If you properly create a matrix (2d array), you can simply do the following
```julia> somex = [1 2 3 ;
       4 5 6 ;
       7 8 9]
3×3 Array{Int64,2}:  # Note the type here
 1  2  3
 4  5  6
 7  8  9

julia> v = 1:3  # No need to actually collect that
1:3

julia> somex .^ v
3×3 Array{Int64,2}:
   1    2    3
  16   25   36
 343  512  729```
The operation is broadcasted by row because 1d array are considered column vector (transposing the vector applies the operation by column)
